title: Coffee Ricotta
introduction: Coffee Ricotta is a quick and versatile dessert that pairs perfectly with plain butter cookies. The finely ground espresso mixed with ricotta offers a smooth, rich flavor, creating a delightful treat to satisfy your sweet tooth.
instructions: In a medium bowl, whisk together the ricotta, espresso, and sugar until the mixture is smooth and the sugar is dissolved. (For a creamier texture, mix the ingredients in a food processor.)
Spoon into parfait glasses or goblets and top with chocolate shavings.

variations.description: For chocolate ricotta, substitute 1 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa for the coffee.
